ἐκθαμβ-έω,
to be amazed, [Refs 5th c.AD+]
__II transitive, amaze, astonish, [LXX]:—passive, [NT+2nd c.AD+]

(passive) to be overwhelmed with wonder, distressed, alarmed
pas., to be amazed, astonished, awe-struck, Mk. 9:15; 14:33; 16:5, 6*

vocabInfos._vi_Definition: khiến kinh hoàng; rất ngạc nhiên
